CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published after the fact in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 24, 1962, pg. A6, reads: "PARTY TIME - Mrs. Robert L. Vann entertained in 1944, honoring her houseguests, Mmes, Ethel Jenkins and Hazel Reid, with several other out-of-towners present to add charm to the day. Left to right, seated: Mrs. Lacy Doss, Philadelphia; the late Mrs. D. W. Byrd; Mrs. Ella Powell; the late Mrs. Carrie Millan of Philadelphia; the late Ethel Jenkins of Cleveland; Mrs. Florence Byrd Duke, Petersburg, Va., and Mrs. Hazel Reid of Portsmouth, Va. Standing: Mmes. Florence Lewis, Ella Christian, Eleanor Jones, Winifred Moss, Daisy E. Lampkin, the late Amanda Brown, Esther Summers, the late Marie Hamilton, Marge Butler, Mrs. Vann, Kathleen Douglass, Carolyn Stevenson, the late Lillian Jackson; 'Honey' Lee, the late Mary Cole Gould and Corinne Lindsay; Gladys Curtis and Eva Poole.  Rear: Mmes. Marie Robinson, Billie Butler, Marge Harris, Billie Brown, the late Adah Stewart, Helen Prattis and Toki Schalk Johnson."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women in evening wear seated from left: Lacy Doss, Mrs. D. W. Byrd, Ella Powell, Carrie Millan, Ethel Jenkins, Florence Byrd Duke, Hazel Reid; standing front row: Florence Lewis, Ella Christian, Eleanor Jones, Winifred Moss, Daisy E. Lampkin, Amanda Brown, Esther Summers, Marie Hamilton, Marge Butler, Jessie Vann looking forward, Kathleen Douglass, Carolyn Stevenson, Lillian Jackson, "Honey" Lee, Mary Cole Gould, Corinne Lindsay, Gladys Curtis, Eva Poole; rear: Marie Robinson, Billie Butler, Marge Harris, Wilhelmina "Billie" Byrd Brown, Adah Stewart, Helen Prattis, and Toki Schalk Johnson, gathered on patio of Vann estate
